title: 8th_ss_cavalry_division_florian_geyer
body:

One of it's most notable commanders was Hermann Fegelein.

title: ivis
body:
A [[mecha musume]] from the game [[Cosmic Break]], Ivis is characterized by her [[long hair|long]] [[white hair]] with a black bow and her [[weapon]] (that makes incredibly powerful and fast attacks and sports an eye on the shoulder plates).

She, along with her upgraded form, Ivis Reine, is a Garapon-Only completely locked LND robot.

She is considered one of the major characters in [[Cosmic Break]]'s story, and is also a NPC in the game.

title: carrying_pole
body:
Carrying pole, shoulder pole, milkmaid's yoke (...), is a yoke, used by people to [[carrying_over_shoulder|carry]] a load. It might be used in one of two basic ways:

* A single person balances the yoke over one shoulder, with an evenly distributed load being suspended from each end.
* Two people support the yoke by resting it on a shoulder, with the load suspended from the centre of the yoke.

h4. See also

* [[yoke]]

h4. External links

* "Wikipedia":https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Carrying_pole

title: azami_(kagerou_project)
body: Character from [[Kagerou Project]]. Full-blooded Medusa. Grandmother of [[Kozakura Marry]] and creator of the Heat Haze world. She gives a young Mary the Queen Snake (the snake that can control all of the others) when she was on the verge of death after her [[kozakura_shion|mother]] and her were attacked in [[souzou_forest_(vocaloid)|Souzou Forest]].
other_names: アザミ(カゲロウプロジェクト)

title: emperor_penguin_(kemono_friends)
body:
A [i][[Kemono Friends]][/i] character. She is one of many "Friends" in Japari Park. Part of [[penguins_performance_project_(kemono_friends)|Penguins Performance Project]] as "Emperor" ("Koutei").

The Emperor Penguin ([i]Aptenodytes forsteri[/i]) is the largest and heaviest of all extant penguins. It lives in and around Antartica and is the best known penguin species.

Emperor, like the other Penguins, wears a black and white hoodie after their species' plumage with the sleeves ending as mittens, emulating the flippers. In her case, the hood has a yellow hood. She also wears it open, revealing her white leotard (or swimsuit) with a wide collar fading up to yellow as well as [[large_breasts|her physique]]. She also wears thighhighs, accentuating the impact of her greater height compared to the others. She has long black hair with [[hair_over_one_eye|a long bang covering up her left eye]]. The thin orange streak implies that this represents the penguin's beak.
other_names: コウテイペンギン(けものフレンズ)

title: latooni_subota
body:
A [[Super Robot Wars]] character. Voiced by [[Riko Hirai]]. She pilots the Fairlions along with Princess [[Shine Hausen]].

Currently trying to get her crush [[Ryuusei Date]]'s attention, but time will tell if she is successful. One notes that she has to [[cosplay]] [[Valsione]] for her to make progress.

title: imperial_german_flag
body:
The national flag of the [[Germany|German Empire]]. It consists of three equal horizontal bars of black, white and red. It is sometimes seen defaced with the [[iron cross]], which was the marine jack of the German Empire.

This flag and the [[Imperial War Flag]] are often used as substitutes of the [[Nazi Flag]] or [[Nazi War Ensign]], which are illegal in Germany.

h4. See Also

* [[Imperial War Flag]]

title: nazi_war_ensign
body:
The war [[flag]] and war ensign used by [[Nazi]] [[Germany]] from 1935-1945. It was based on the [[imperial_war_flag|Imperial German war flag]], and features a red background with four black arms emanating from an off-center white circle with a black [[swastika]], and an [[iron cross]] in the canton.

h4. See Also

* [[Nazi Flag]]
* [[Imperial War Flag]]

title: hajime_sorayama
body: Hajime Sorayama was born in Ehime Prefecture, Japan. He graduated from Chuo Art School in 1969. His style is very unique in that he combines fetishes and themes typically seen in hentai with a more "western" drawing technique. He is most famous for his series of sexy robot women and "gynoids."

title: olivia_de_berardinis
body: Olivia de Berardinis attended the New York School of Visual Arts. She worked as a freelance artist for a while, but financial insecurity soon forced her to seek out commercial jobs. She found steady work painting erotica for men's magazines. It is evident in her work that pin-up models such as Bettie Page and Marilyn Monroe have influenced her greatly. Another common theme is ballerinas.

title: boris_vallejo
body:
Born in Lima, Peru, Boris attended the National School of Fine Arts in his native country before immigrating to the United States in 1964.

He has since done a great volume of work for the Fantasy field, having worked for virtually every major publishing house with a science fiction/fantasy line. Boris has also illustrated for album covers, video box art and motion picture advertising.

title: shikkaku_ishi
body:
H-game

The “hero” of this one was majoring in medicine, but was expelled from the university due to playing around (it must’ve been pretty bad to get him expelled!). However, it would appear that his brother graduated at the university with flying colors. His brother has always been the bane of his existence--one-upping him in everything. Now the brother has been working as a doctor at a local hospital and has been making quite nice reputation for himself. He’s now off to vacation with his fiancée, and our protagonist sees this as an opportunity to take his place and ruin his brother’s perfect situation (and have a little fun along the way). Oh yeah, I neglected to mention that the two brothers are twins, so they’ll be none the wiser.

title: x-change
body:
[[X-Change]] is a erotic game series by Peach Princess, where you play a young man named Takuya, who, due to drinking a strange science experiment, ends up being the unwitting guinea pig in a gender swap experiment, which is the source of the title of the series.

The game was followed up by a sequel, X-Change 2, where Takuya ends up accidentally turned into a girl by a machine, as well as a third, and final, part, X-Change 3, which completed the storyline.

The game's premise in all three games, is deceptively simple, that Takuya has to find a cure for his transformation.
This is made more difficult by the fact that a lot of characters in the game want Takuya to stay a girl, and the endings reflect that, with only one or two endings leading to the cure.

The series was followed up by Ying-Yang! X-Change Alternative, a new slant on the series, which uses a different main character and setting, although keeping the concept of the sex-change potion.

title: sapphism_no_gensou
body:
サフィズムの舷窓 ~The case of H.B.Polarstar~

2001 eroge by Liar-soft, illustrated by [[Koume Keito]]. Its enhanced remake, "Sapphism no Gensou ~an epic~" was released in 2004.

After boarding a ship for a semester at sea, the "prince" of lesbians has been accused of multiple rapes. Unless she can discover the true criminal she'll be thrown off the ship.

title: suehirogari
body:
Japanese Manga-ka specializing in BDSM and Exhibitionism.  Combines other elements at will -- has done shota, loli, yuri and yaoi at random points in his career.  Used to have a website, however, it went down in early 2001 and was never re-uploaded.

Several of his works have been translated by the Munyu Heavy Industries team.

Early works of his were translated professionally by Eros Comix under the “Sexhibition” line, making Suehirogari one of the first hentai artists that many Manga fans from the 80s and 90s ever saw.

Rather infamous on 2ch for his lack of ability to keep up schedules.  Currently doing Somuniiru in Comic Megamilk (which is what Comic 0EX was renamed to) every other month.

title: tonarine_sai
body:
h4. Tonarine Sai (隣音サイ)

Could be seen as a Vocaloid derivative character, but notable in that her songs are actually sung by a real person (Utaite) and modified to sound like a [[Vocaloid]]. The name was created because she thought her neighbors would say she was too loud, since the artist for Sai apparently records out of her bedroom. Tonari (neighbor) ne (hey!) Urusai (Be quiet! (you're being noisy)).

As a character, she is a tall girl with long [[curly hair|curly]] [[pink hair]]. She dresses very similar to [[Hatsune Miku]], but wears a pair of spats (JP: spandex pants).

h4. See also

* [[List of Vocaloid derivatives]]

title: pisipisi
body:
A Japanese artist, famous for his cute furry girls (which typically are just normal girls with a bit of fuzz on their cheeks) as well as his tentacle stuff.

Also has a longrunning series about a college student cloning the girl he likes who hates him, and putting his mind in her body.

Currently blocks all access to his website from the US due to harassment.

May or may not be the professional artist Saiwase Okiba's pen name.

title: hirai_yukari
body:
A character of [[Shakugan no Shana]]. [[Shana]] takes over Yukari's identity using the remains of her "Power of Existence" (life force) after she became a Torch (an entity replacement for a human whose Power of Existence has been significantly depleted) and eventually disappeared.

To distinguish Yukari from Shana, one must consider the following:

* Yukari's eyes were purple; Shana in neutral form has brown eyes.
* Yukari had small [[twintails]]. Shana rarely wears them, but when she does, they are in huge tresses.
* Yukari did not have the [[ahoge]] Shana has.
* Yukari did not wear [[thighhighs|thigh-high socks]] like Shana does.

Senne has long auburn hair, red eyes, glasses, a mole on her right breast near the nipple and a curly [[ahoge]]. Although, in some of Yomogi's early art of her, she is lacking some of these traits.

She is the younger sister of another character, [[Arima Senka]].

title: canards
body:
In aeronautics, control surfaces that are forward of an [[airplane]]'s main wing (and center of lift/gravity) and act similarly to tailplanes to provide pitch stability and control. 

The term [b]canard[/b] is derived from the French word for "duck," which was applied to early canard-using aircraft, as observers thought they resembled ducks in flight.

title: suppressor
body:
A firearm accessory designed to minimize audible report and [[muzzle flash]]. A suppressor basically consists of a tube that may screw or latch onto the end of a gun barrel and is filled with baffles that allow air otherwise pushed out the front of the gun to slow down and expand.

Suppressors are sometimes known as "silencers," but this is an exaggeration of the abilities of a suppressor to lessen sound. As long as bullet travels at supersonic speeds, it will still create the distinctive "boom." However, it is possible to make a very quiet weapon using subsonic ammunition, eliminating the sonic boom and thus the major source of loudness for a weapon.

"Kikuchi Naoe is a struggling manga artist in need of work. She lucks out when she runs into a travel writer and is asked to tag along. He turns out to be Yokomi Hirohiko, the Japan's biggest train enthusiast. In 1995, he visited all 4636 JR train stations. Now he is going to visit the remaining 5207 private stations. Kikuchi, despite her inital horror at her task, is stuck, as her boss is a huge train geek too. Thus, having few other options, she resigns herself to trying it out and henceforth accompanies Yokomi on his journey around Japan. [This series is non-fictional ]"

title: honey_blonde
body:
Ero manga series originally published in Comic Megastore (now released as a tankoubon) by [[kensou_ogawa|Fukudahda]].

h4. Characters

* [[eleanor mercer|Eleanor Mercer]], or Erina to her friends. Due to growing up in Japan, she has Japanese tastes in food and can't speak English - in fact, she's failing her English class.
* Yumioka Masaki, her childhood friend and sex buddy.
* [[takeuchi shinobu|Takeuchi Shinobu]], Erina and Masaki's female classmate.
* Yoshimi Tetsu, Erina and Masaki's male classmate. [spoiler]He and Shinobu are secretly carrying on a relationship.[/spoiler]
* [[karen mercer|Karen Mercer]], Erina's mother. British. Close friends with Masaki's parents.

h4. Summary

Since Erina's mother Karen works for an airline company and travels constantly, she left Erina in the care of Masaki's parents when the two were very young. She and Masaki have been together ever since. The manga is a short chronicle of their life and relationship (mostly sexual) during an eventful part of their time in high school.

The hook? Apparently, Erina inherited several physical quirks from her mother: Blonde hair, blue eyes, large breasts, an almost nymphomaniac sex drive, and a unique hormone condition that has caused her breasts to lactate since she started puberty.
